name: Claude Skills
description: A collection of productivity skills for Claude Code

plugins.name: content-processor
plugins.description: Process any content source (YouTube, websites, EPUBs, markdown) into structured summaries

plugins.name: skill-builder
plugins.description: Interactive guide for creating and maintaining high-quality Claude skills. Use when creating, updating, or refactoring skills.

plugins.name: doc-optimizer
plugins.description: Optimizes markdown documentation for token efficiency and clarity. Reduces duplication, improves structure.

plugins.name: study-assistant
plugins.description: Personal study assistant for courses and learning materials. Helps with lectures, course content, and notes.

plugins.name: go-script-style
plugins.description: Go CLI script writing conventions and patterns. Use when creating Go automation scripts or CLI tools.

plugins.name: timing-analyzer
plugins.description: Query and analyze personal time tracking data from Timing.app. Daily/weekly reports, productivity insights, cognitive analysis.

plugins.name: godspeed-tasks
plugins.description: Manage Godspeed tasks via CLI, HTTP API, or SQLite. Query, create, update tasks with full API reference.

plugins.name: work-principles
plugins.description: Ray Dalio's Work Principles framework. Idea meritocracy, believability-weighted decisions, organization as machine.

plugins.name: architecture-as-code
plugins.description: Build and maintain architecture knowledge bases for complex multi-repo systems. Bootstrap, discovery, cross-skill integration.

plugins.name: personal-evolution
plugins.description: Learn from pain, make decisions, extract principles. Dalio's Principles + structured lesson capture. Pain→Reflection→Progress.

plugins.name: session-recap
plugins.description: Generate token-efficient session summaries. Tasks completed, files changed, decisions, learnings, pending items.
